de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.comparatives.liu

Class LiuAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.comparatives.liu.LiuAnnotation

  • public class LiuAnnotation
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts an annotaiton in the Jindal and Liu format to the IMS format.
    Author:
    kesslewd
